a.pkid AS "pkid", a.prjnum AS "prjnum", a.prjname AS "prjName", a.buildcorpname AS "buildcorpname", a.buildcorpcode AS "buildcorpcode", a.prjapprovalnum AS "prjapprovalnum", a.PROJECT_CODE AS "prjCode"
INNER JOIN dbo.TBProjectAdditionalInfo i ON i.prjnum = a.PrjNum
mapper.select:
SELECT TOP 1
FROM tbprojectinfo a
UpdateFlag != 'D' AND CountyNum = '320211'
AND a.PrjName like '%'+#{prjname}+'%'

SELECT TOP 1
FROM tbprojectinfo a
UpdateFlag != 'D' AND CountyNum = '320211'
AND MajorProjectLib.dbo.GET_NUMBER2(a.prjapprovalnum) = #{approvenum}
AND ( CHARINDEX(MajorProjectLib.dbo.CHINA_STR(a.prjapprovalnum), #{approvetype}) > 0 OR CHARINDEX(#{approvetype},MajorProjectLib.dbo.CHINA_STR(a.prjapprovalnum)) > 0 )

SELECT TOP 1
FROM tbprojectinfo a LEFT JOIN MajorProjectLib.[dbo].[DG_Programme_Info] b on a.PrjNum = b.PrjNum
UpdateFlag != 'D' AND CountyNum = '320211'
AND b.fb_year+b.num = #{approvenum}
AND b.lxwh_type like #{approvetype}+'%'

SELECT
FROM tbprojectinfo a
UpdateFlag != 'D' AND CountyNum = '320211'
AND a.PrjName like '%'||#{prjname}||'%' '%'+#{prjname}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjname}, '%')
AND a.PrjNum like '%'||#{prjnum}||'%' '%'+#{prjnum}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjnum}, '%')
AND a.BuildCorpName like '%'||#{buildcorpname}||'%' '%'+#{buildcorpname}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{buildcorpname}, '%')
AND a.PrjApprovalNum like '%'||#{prjapprovalnum}||'%' '%'+#{prjapprovalnum}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjapprovalnum}, '%')
AND a.MajorFlag = #{majorFlag}
AND a.allinvest >= #{allinvest}
AND a.PROJECT_CODE IS NULL
AND a.PROJECT_CODE like '%'||#{prjCode}||'%' '%'+#{prjCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjCode}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT
FROM tbprojectinfo a
UpdateFlag != 'D' AND CountyNum = '320211' AND AllInvest >= 5000
AND a.PrjName like '%'||#{prjname}||'%' '%'+#{prjname}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjname}, '%')
AND a.PrjNum like '%'||#{prjnum}||'%' '%'+#{prjnum}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjnum}, '%')
AND a.BuildCorpName like '%'||#{buildcorpname}||'%' '%'+#{buildcorpname}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{buildcorpname}, '%')
AND a.PrjApprovalNum like '%'||#{prjapprovalnum}||'%' '%'+#{prjapprovalnum}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjapprovalnum}, '%')
AND a.PROJECT_CODE IS NULL
AND a.PROJECT_CODE like '%'||#{prjCode}||'%' '%'+#{prjCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{prjCode}, '%')
AND a.allinvest >= #{allinvest}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}

SELECT PrjNum ,PrjName ,PrjApprovalNum ,CreateDate FROM tbprojectinfo a
a.UpdateFlag != 'D' AND a.CountyNum = '320211' AND PrjNum NOT IN ( SELECT prj_num FROM pub_approve_result WHERE prj_num IS NOT NULL GROUP BY prj_num )
ORDER BY a.CreateDate DESC
